author: Kat
text: Sasha is freaking out about the possibility of Harmony not making it. Millow go to the ICU- Willow realizes Harmony didn’t make it. #GH I can’t live tweet the rest of the show- gotta go to work ☹️

author: Kat
text: Nina talks about Sonny to Valentin- Valentin recognizes that she has feelings for Sonny and whether it works or not she can count on him and the hold hands- she will remember that 🤨 #GH

author: Kat
text: Felicia isn’t sure how she feels about raising a child, Anna tells her that this is a conversation for her and Mac but no matter the answer she’s behind her. Robert says the same thing- they go back inside. Lenny leaves and Sonny doesn’t know how to get home from his dream. #GH

author: Kat
text: Ghost Lenny asks about Nina and that time is fleeting- Sonny asks what his secret with Phyllis. TJ trying to revive Harmony - she flatlines and dies as Carly watches. Brasha talk about Liam but Carly arrives with bad news and tells Willow she need to go the ICU #Gh

author: Kat
text: Harmony wants Carly to promise to keep the secret and goes into cardiac arrest. Valentin regrets using Sasha to manipulate her, she understands him better now. They talk about Nelle and Carly’s hand in her death- Valentin asks about Sonny being in her life. #GH

author: Kat
text: Willow regrets all the time she lost with her mom. She talks about how dangerous her biological mom is- Willow knows her- she was one of two- the other half- Carly asks if she was a twin? Harmony tells her Nelle- Carly WTF? Nina is her biological mother?!#GH

author: Kat
text: Sonny and ghost Lenny talking about Michael  #GH

author: Kat
text: Nina and Valentin talk Charlotte and how much he misses her. They talk Bailey and losing children who weren’t yours. Sasha having a conversation with mirror Sasha about drugs and she flushed them down the toilet. #GH

author: Kat
text: Anna asking Felicia what she wants. Robert makes jokes but is serious about being grateful that he helped raise Robin. Mac tells him that he loves raising them all, but he and Felicia never had their own.Robert asks if this is about Felicia or if he wants a child too. #GH

author: Kat
text: Ghost Lenny gives Sonny a ghost cowboy hat. They sit to talk. Carly tells Harmony that she was adopted too. Harmony says that willow will never be safe with her and she can never know- still no secret reveal #GH

author: Kat
text: Nina tells Valentin that she’s spoken to Charlotte and is surprised he sent her off to school- he says it wasn’t easy- Victor is the one who dropped her off at school. She tells Valentin that she will always be there for Charlotte- he’ll keep that in mind. #GH

author: Kat
text: Felicia makes a comment on about the blood moon being a bad omen for pregnant women- Anna says at least they don’t have to worry about that-right? Mac inside talking to Robert abt parenthood- Felicia tells Anna she’s not but thinks Mac wants a baby-Mac inside saying that abt Flea

author: Kat
text: Sonny gives his bodyguard some meatball in his special sauce, then goes back into the PH- daydreams about Nixon Falls and Lenny shows up. Harmony tells Carly she should have repaired the damage when she had the chance- still no secret reveal #GH

author: Kat
text: Anna wants to open a bottle of wine, but Felicia wants to talk to Anna- they go outside and Anna wants to know what’s going on. Valentin goes to Charlie’s and ask to join Phyllis and Nina. When asked how he’s doing he says he’s maintaining #GH

author: Kat
text: Anna calling Robert a stick in the mud, him telling her she loves him for it, she tells him that’s not true and Robert telling her that it is and that he’s pretty sure it’s written somewhere 😂 How can you not love them? 😊 #GH

author: Kat
text: Phyllis to see Nina and Sonny at home flashbacks. Mikey telling Willow about their trip to Paris- you know who’ll love it? Wiley🙄 Brasha arrives to lend support. Carly doesn’t think Harmony is making sense- Harmony wants Carly to protect Willow no matter the cost #GH

author: Kat
text: RnA watching Hulu- squee🥰the banter😁Felicia and Mac are at the door #GH #RnA #ChillinWithHulu

author: Kat
text: I just got home from work & what’s waiting for me at my door? A case of cat food I had ordered 😢 I do want to a moment now that I’m home again to thank everyone for all the kind words & sentiments today. It really means a lot to me & I’m grateful for my friendships here❤️‍🩹

author: Kat
text: I had to say goodbye to my Lily today and I’m just so sad. My last photo of her- she surprised me one morning a couple of week ago by coming upstairs to my room for a cuddle. I will miss her little face and the orange tip on her tail 😔💔 https://t.co/z5YWtkCaQq

author: Kat
text: Spinelli tells Britt to keep trying and that Mr. Right is out there- she leaves. Sonny joins Nina. Carly wants to tell Willow the secret first. Willow holds Harmony’s hand- they need to talk- Harmony opens her eyes #GH

author: Kat
text: The kids are asleep- Austin thanks Maxie for a wonderful evening- she thanks him for being kind to Spinelli-she can’t make plans for tomorrow because of the kids- he’s ok. Britt tells Nina that Liesl left and that she’s going too- Britt runs into Spinelli on the way out #GH

author: Kat
text: Liesl leaves. Mac and Felicia outside the apartment kissing then leave. Liz tells Finn about the voice she heard- she’s not sure what to think anymore. Finn is in awe of her strength- they kiss. #GH

author: Kat
text: Leisl wishes Britt and Nina long healthy lives. Nina goes to get drinks. Britt tells Leisl that she was stood up again- why waste time on a man- Liesl asks is it that she only wants Jason 🙄 she encourages her to move on- to find someone to do fun things with her. #GH

author: Kat
text: Alexis wants to go home and leaves Carly to handle the rest. Carly tells Mikey that Harmony drugged her because of Willow. Willow talks to Harmony- she believed her rehabilitation and she’s her mom- she wants her to wake up. #GH

author: Kat
text: Finn and Liz play slap Jack. She tells him that she hears voices and he stops playing. Willow is left alone with Harmony. Sam, Alexis, Carly and Mikey wait outside- he wants to know what happened and what it has to do with Harmony #GH

author: Kat
text: Sonny thinks Spinelli still loves Maxie, but he denies it. Britt tells Leisl that Willow and Harmony reminds her to value family- Nina says family is important. Felicia and Mac talk a little before Austin and Maxie come crashing in. #GH

author: Kat
text: Britt arrives to join the ladies. Felicia asks Mac if he could go back wouldn’t he want to have his own child- he asks what she’s talking about 🤔 Alexis tells an unconscious Harmony what she really thinks about her killing Neil. Millow walk in. #GH

author: Kat
text: Harmony still doesn’t understand how this happened- she lights a candle in the chapel and is now ready to see Harmony. Spinelli tells Sonny that he’s working on a new business venture and he’ll let him know once it takes off. Nina and Leisl argue about Scott and Sonny #GH

author: Kat
text: Finn tells Liz he got the room next to hers. He tells her that they can be honest and trust each other in their relationship- she wants to go home and be with her boys- he thinks he can help her with that #GH

author: Kat
text: Alexis and Sam looking at Harmony through window. Maxie and Austin try to cheer up Spinelli- Austin invited him to go kayaking 😂 and they leave. Nina and Sonny- he flashes back to his convo with Mikey. Leisl arrives and Nina goes with her- Spinelli talks to Sonny. #GH

author: Kat
text: Carly tells Willow that when she came to Harmony was going to attack Alexis, but she stopped her and then Harmony ran off and was hit by the car. Mikey comes in with an update on Harmony- Carly says the rest can wait- Britt says they had to stop surgery for a medical reason #GH

author: Kat
text: Sam doesn’t get her friendship with Harmony- Alexis wants closure. Britt runs out and wants to know where Willow is- they run to the chapel. Carly tells Willow that Harmony attacked her- Carly tells her she discovered a secret #GH

author: Kat
text: It’s serious Weezy with Felicia and Mac at her Maxie’s apartment- they talk about Georgie. Spinelli shows up at the Savoy- Austin and Maxie talk about him and call him over- they give dating tips. Nina and Sonny talk about Nixon Falls. Mikey apologizes to Britt for being an ass

author: Kat
text: Sonny talking to a guy at the Savoy- Nina arrives. Maxie and Austin at the Savoy- she has to go and get her kids?! Liz in her MC room- Finn knocks on the door with flowers. Mikey upset; Sam and Alexis argue about Harmony; Carly  prepares to tell Willow #GH

author: Kat
text: So, everyone has been thinking Willow was going to have an illness that would expose that she’s not Harmony’s biological child, but what if Harmony’s injuries reveal it?

author: Kat
text: Ava tells Nik that trust is built over time and leaves. Willow doesn’t understand why her mom was out there in the woods- Carly comes in and says she knows and asks to be alone- Sasha leaves.End.  #GH

author: Kat
text: Brando tells Mikey what happened. Gladys has the memory card. Spencer deflects and says that all this stress isn’t good for her. He tells her everything will be over soon and they’ll never have to see each other again. Ava stops Nik- she says sex can’t fix everything- #GH

author: Kat
text: Trina watching Spencer and Esme taking about their second chance. Esme wants a front row seats in court when they drag her away- Spencer is like don’t about her like that! #GH

author: Kat
text: Gladis is really worried about Sasha. She leaves when Joss comes over- Carly Joss moment. Ava tells Nik that she will put aside things for Spencer but not Esme. They discuss they have problems in their marriage- she admits she’s already thought about divorce but she ❤️him- they💋

author: Kat
text: Willow hears the news. Sasha starts to leave and Willow stops her- she asks if Carly or Alexis were there- no. Willow asks if it seemed like Harmony did it intentionally- no, she seemed like she didn’t see her. Willow is so confused about how things happened. #GH

author: Kat
text: Brando tells the reporter he fought to protect those rights, but it protects him from the government censoring his speech-Do I look like the government to you? No. Brando threatens him if he ever sees him anywhere near his wife again. Umm…he’s more threatening than the other guy

author: Kat
text: Mikey introduces Brando to the reporter. He makes a comment about Sasha and Brando lunges at him- Mikey stops him and reporter is all about his 1st amendment rights. #GH

author: Kat
text: Esme is upset that he is always having a moment- he denies it- she asks about him being jealous of a cop. Spencer tells her he’s not jealous just annoyed because he’s the cop that arrested him- she seems to buy it all. #GH

author: Kat
text: Sasha tells Willow what happened and how she hit Harmony and that she didn’t know who it was until she got out to help her. #GH

author: Kat
text: Brando and Mikey talking- they don’t know why Carly is at GH. The reporter gets off the elevator and wants to know if Brando has a comment about his wife running down a pedestrian. Gladys tells Carly that Sasha hit Harmony. #GH

author: Kat
text: Carly wants to tell Willow what she knows but Joss tells her Maybe now’s not the time. Brasha see Millow in the chapel and Sasha asks to speak to Willow alone. #GH

author: Kat
text: Spencer trying to shut Esme up and her her out. Esme threatens Trina but Trina tells her that she says sees her and so will everyone with maybe the exception of that idiot 😂 she tells them that the gallery is now closed and they need to leave or they’ll be trespassing #GH

author: Kat
text: Ava tells Nik they have a trust issue but he thinks it’s because he chose Spencer over her, well really, he chose Ava over Spencer and not Esme over Ava 🤷🏻‍♀️

author: Kat
text: Nik tells Ava that Laura made Sonny promise not to hurt Esme- Great! Is she leaving tonight? dumbass says she’s leaving but not right away- Ava girl, you got yourself a winner there 🙄  #GH

author: Kat
text: Trina is like I’m the psycho? Esme tells Spencer that she’s safe now- Trina sees it as a tragic waste of cement 😂😂😂#GH
